Directions: In a large bowl, combine all ingredients. Transfer to a greased 2-qt. baking dish. Cover and bake at 350 degrees F for 1-1/2 hours or until potatoes are tender.
Ingredients: 1 pound ground beef, cooked and drained
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of chicken soup, undiluted
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed vegetable beef soup, undiluted
